title: Collab Auto-Retry and Backoff Coordinator
reason: We need this skill because multi-agent systems underperform without explicit conflict resolution. This specific skill improves success rates while preventing retry storms.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Collab Auto-Retry and Backoff Coordinator`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to deadlocks and degraded trust.
Design and version the input/output contract for proposals, contention signals, and negotiated outcomes, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using adaptive backoff control, and produce retry policy decisions with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover deadlocks and degraded trust, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.
